fmrireg

In Development

The fmrireg package is currently in development. The goal of the project is to provide functions for carrying out regression anaysis with fMRI data. It’s Not Ready for Primetime, but still have a look at vignettes:

Vignettes

See examples of use of fmrireg in the vignettes.
